title: S12 Ep46: Southern Scares: Haunted Savannah
itunes:title: Southern Scares: Haunted Savannah
description:
Chris Allen shares chilling tales of one of America's most haunted cities. We discuss The Curse of Savannah, Hideous Hag Attacks, Skin Stealers, Ghouls, Ghosts & More.

Chris Allen: https://www.hauntedsavannahtours.com/
